app_title: SLP Descubre - Your Expat Guide to San Luis Potosí
app_description: The essential resource for expatriates and newcomers in San Luis Potosí - discover local insights, services, and community

categories.subtitle: ESSENTIAL RESOURCES
categories.popularDescription: Everything you need to settle in and thrive in San Luis Potosí, organized by category for easy access.

essentials.title: Daily Essentials
essentials.description: Grocery stores, supermarkets, pharmacies, and essential services with international products and English-speaking staff.

healthcare.title: Healthcare
healthcare.description: Expat-friendly hospitals, clinics, specialists, and emergency services with English-speaking medical professionals.

accommodation.title: Housing
accommodation.description: Long and short-term rentals, real estate services, and relocation assistance tailored to expatriate needs.

education.title: Education
education.description: International schools, language courses, universities, and continuing education opportunities for expatriates.

recreation.title: Recreation & Leisure
recreation.description: Sports facilities, fitness centers, entertainment venues, and cultural activities welcoming to the international community.

transportation.title: Transportation
transportation.description: Reliable transportation options, vehicle rentals, driving regulations, and navigation resources for newcomers.

services.title: Professional Services
services.description: Banking, legal assistance, translation services, and administrative support for foreigners living in the city.

community.title: Community & Social
community.description: Expat groups, social clubs, networking events, and volunteer opportunities to help you build connections.

site_title: SLP Descubre - Your Expat Guide to San Luis Potosí
site_description: Navigate life in San Luis Potosí with ease - from relocation services to local insights and city hacks for expatriates

featuredPlaces.checkFeatured: Check that you have marked businesses as featured in your data source.
featuredPlaces.title: Featured Destinations
featuredPlaces.description: Explore these handpicked gems that showcase the best of San Luis Potosí's culture, cuisine, and hospitality.
featuredPlaces.noDescription: Discover this remarkable place in San Luis Potosí.

hero.expatGuide: Your Personal Connection in San Luis Potosí
hero.title: We Know Everyone You Need to Know
hero.subtitle: Your Insider Guide to San Luis Potosí
hero.description: Skip the confusion and frustration of figuring things out alone. We've built relationships with the best service providers, housing options, and local experts throughout the city.
hero.personalTouch: Think of us as that well-connected friend who always "knows a guy" - we'll make the right introductions and handle all the details for you.

welcome.subtitle: YOUR PERSONAL CONCIERGE
welcome.title: We've Got Your Back in San Luis Potosí
welcome.description: Getting set up in a new city can be overwhelming, especially in a foreign country. That's why we've built relationships with all the right people - so you don't have to.
welcome.intermediary: We handle all arrangements and introductions for a simple service fee, saving you time, stress, and often money.

card1.title: Local Connections
card1.description: We'll introduce you to our trusted network of service providers, from plumbers and electricians to language tutors and childcare professionals.

card2.title: Restaurant Reservations
card2.description: Get tables at the best restaurants, special treatment, and even custom menus - all through our personal relationships with local establishments.

card3.title: Relocation Support
card3.description: Navigate bureaucratic processes, banking setup, and essential services to smoothly integrate into the Potosino lifestyle.

expatServices.subtitle: EXPAT SERVICES
expatServices.title: Making Your Transition Seamless
expatServices.description: Our specialized services for expatriates cover everything you need to settle comfortably in San Luis Potosí.

relocation.title: Relocation Assistance
relocation.description: Comprehensive support with visa paperwork, local registration, and essential setup services for new arrivals.

housing.title: Housing Services
housing.description: Find expat-friendly housing options, navigate rental agreements, and get support with utilities and home setup.

legal.title: Legal & Administrative
legal.description: Expert assistance with residency permits, banking setup, tax considerations, and other official procedures.

community.title: Community Integration
community.description: Connect with fellow expatriates, join international groups, and participate in cultural exchange activities.

family.title: Family Support Services
family.description: Babysitters, tutoring, international schooling assistance, and pediatric healthcare connections for expatriate families.

petcare.title: Pet Care Services
petcare.description: Dog walkers, pet sitters, veterinary recommendations, pet-friendly housing, and pet import/registration assistance.

wellness.title: Wellness & Mental Health
wellness.description: Bilingual counseling, expat adjustment support groups, English-speaking medical specialists, and stress management resources.

homeservices.title: Home Services Network
homeservices.description: Vetted electricians and plumbers, housekeeping, moving, furniture assembly, and interior design for transitional homes.

expatServices.feeDisclosure: We charge a simple service fee to connect you with our trusted network of local professionals and service providers.

cultural.title: Cultural Immersion
cultural.description: Experience the rich traditions, history and authentic culture of San Luis Potosí through guided immersion services like cooking classes with local chefs or social gatherings with both locals and fellow expats.

experiences.title: Exclusive Experiences
experiences.description: Access to invitation-only gatherings, private tours, and special experiences not available to the general public.

cityHacks.subtitle: INSIDER TIPS
cityHacks.title: Local Insights for Expatriates
cityHacks.description: Practical tips and insider knowledge to help you navigate daily life in San Luis Potosí like a local.

transport.title: Transportation Hacks
transport.description: Navigate public transit, taxis, rideshares, and learn where to rent or buy vehicles with expat-friendly services.

shopping.title: Shopping Guide
shopping.description: Find international products, navigate local markets, and discover the best places for everyday essentials.

language.title: Language Essentials
language.description: Essential Spanish phrases, language exchange opportunities, and translation services for expatriates.

cultural.subtitle: CULTURAL INTEGRATION
cultural.title: Understanding Local Culture & Customs
cultural.description: San Luis Potosí boasts a cultural richness that reflects centuries of history, from its designation as a UNESCO World Heritage site to its vibrant arts scene and culinary traditions.
cultural.expatDescription: Navigate the rich cultural landscape of San Luis Potosí with our expat-focused guides, helping you understand and participate in local traditions while respecting cultural norms.
cultural.imageCaption1: Historic Center - UNESCO World Heritage Site

history.title: Colonial History
history.description: Founded in 1592, the city preserves its Spanish colonial heritage through magnificent architecture and urban design.
history.expatDescription: Guided historical walks and tours designed for expatriates, with English-speaking guides explaining the context behind the city's rich heritage.

architecture.title: Baroque Splendor
architecture.description: Marvel at the ornate baroque facades and interiors of churches and buildings that showcase the region's mining wealth.

festivals.title: Local Festivities & Events
festivals.description: Join community celebrations, festivals, and cultural events with our expat-friendly guides explaining traditions and customs.

language.title: Language & Communication
language.description: Resources to help you navigate language barriers, including Spanish classes tailored to expatriates and translation services.

gastronomy.title: Culinary Traditions
gastronomy.description: Savor unique dishes like enchiladas potosinas, asado de boda, and gorditas that define the region's rich gastronomic heritage.

localBrands.subtitle: SUPPORT LOCAL
localBrands.title: Potosino Brands & Artisans
localBrands.description: Discover and support local artisans, creators, and entrepreneurs who embody the spirit and traditions of San Luis Potosí.
localBrands.support: Each purchase supports the local economy and helps preserve cultural traditions.

uniqueMeetings.subtitle: UNIQUE EXPERIENCES
uniqueMeetings.title: Weird Cool Places for Potosino-Style Business Meetings
uniqueMeetings.description: Think outside the office! Discover beautiful, out-of-the-ordinary locations where locals impress clients and hold memorable meetings with a true Potosino flair.

footer.description: SLP Descubre is your comprehensive guide to the best places, experiences, and cultural treasures in San Luis Potosí, Mexico.
footer.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to receive updates on new places, events, and special features in San Luis Potosí.
